ygData.subject: Re: Which race?
ygData.msgSnippet: If someone wanted to have an IRC chat I would love that. It is so much faster to get answers and nice to be in real time instead of play by email. I do not
ygData.messageBody:
If someone wanted to have an IRC chat I would love that. It is so much
faster to get answers and nice to be in real time instead of play by email.
I do not know IRC well so I would not be the one to set it up but I will be
one to participate. You can count me in.

Bracken Fade
Supreme Intelligencer for The Shadow Hand
The League of Swords

>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Which race?
>Date: Thu, 6 May 1999 10:55:43 -0500
>
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> > You might say that because humans get a 20-30% bonus to their
> > experience and they level faster... well, that's great, except that at
>later
> > levels you are hurting yourself when you approach the level limit. I
> > haven't even touched Gnomes yet, and there's no way to calculate the
>bonus
> > that having Ultravision fulltime is, as well as several other things
> > (location, locality, faction)
>
>Ultravision is pretty much negated at level 8, deadeye is the coolest spell
>in my arsenal, all my human character friends are quite envious of that one
>:)
>
>On an unrelated note, there seems to be enough of us on this list to make a
>pretty well stocked irc channel, is anyone interested in starting one?
>Putting up with public EQ chans isn't exactly my idea of fun, but realtime
>necro chat would be quite interesting I'm sure, plus just being able to get
>to know one another.
>
>-Mark
>
>

>Get "in synch!"
>http://www.onelist.com
>With the ONElist Shared Calendar Feature. See homepage.
